# frame

**Instance Property**

A portion of the parent image, in the image’s coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
var frame: CGRect { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to define the portion of the image that you want to call out separately.

## Related Documentation

- **App Programming Guide for watchOS**

## Getting the Region Attributes

- **label**: A succinct label that succinctly identifies the purpose of the image region.
